title: Glutathione Skin Glow Shot
subtitle: Skin brightening & cellular detox
description: The 'master antioxidant' delivered via intramuscular injection for maximum bioavailability. This powerful tripeptide works to neutralize free radicals, lighten skin pigmentation, detoxify the liver, and promote a radiant, even-toned complexion from within.
preparation: Avoid alcohol 24 hours before. Best results with a course of 6-10 sessions.
